00020 #ifndef _MLPACK_METHODS_AMF_SIMPLE_TOLERANCE_TERMINATION_HPP_INCLUDED
00021 #define _MLPACK_METHODS_AMF_SIMPLE_TOLERANCE_TERMINATION_HPP_INCLUDED
00022 
00023 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00024 
00025 namespace mlpack {
00026 namespace amf {
00027 
00028 template <class MatType>
00029 class SimpleToleranceTermination
00030 {
00031  public:
00032   SimpleToleranceTermination(const double tolerance = 1e-5,
00033                              const size_t maxIterations = 10000,
00034                              const size_t reverseStepTolerance = 3)
00035             : tolerance(tolerance),
00036               maxIterations(maxIterations),
00037               reverseStepTolerance(reverseStepTolerance) {}
00038 
00039   void Initialize(const MatType& V)
00040   {
00041     residueOld = DBL_MAX;
00042     iteration = 1;
00043     residue = DBL_MIN;
00044     reverseStepCount = 0;
00045 
00046     this->V = &V;
00047     
00048     c_index = 0;
00049     c_indexOld = 0;
00050 
00051     reverseStepCount = 0;
00052   }
00053 
00054   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00055   {
00056     // Calculate norm of WH after each iteration.
00057     arma::mat WH;
00058 
00059     WH = W * H;
00060 
00061     residueOld = residue;
00062     size_t n = V->n_rows;
00063     size_t m = V->n_cols;
00064     double sum = 0;
00065     size_t count = 0;
00066     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00067     {
00068         for(size_t j = 0;j < m;j++)
00069         {
00070             double temp = 0;
00071             if((temp = (*V)(i,j)) != 0)
00072             {
00073                 temp = (temp - WH(i, j));
00074                 temp = temp * temp;
00075                 sum += temp;
00076                 count++;
00077             }
00078         }
00079     }
00080     residue = sum / count;
00081     residue = sqrt(residue);
00082 
00083     iteration++;  
00084   
00085     if((residueOld - residue) / residueOld < tolerance && iteration > 4)
00086     {
00087       if(reverseStepCount == 0 && isCopy == false)
00088       {
00089         isCopy = true;
00090         this->W = W;
00091         this->H = H;
00092         c_index = residue;
00093         c_indexOld = residueOld;
00094       }
00095       reverseStepCount++;
00096     }
00097     else
00098     {
00099       reverseStepCount = 0;
00100       if(residue <= c_indexOld && isCopy == true)
00101       {
00102         isCopy = false;
00103       }
00104     }
00105 
00106     if(reverseStepCount == reverseStepTolerance || iteration > maxIterations)
00107     {
00108       if(isCopy)
00109       {
00110         W = this->W;
00111         H = this->H;
00112         residue = c_index;
00113       }
00114       return true;
00115     }
00116     else return false;
00117   }
00118 
00119   const double& Index() { return residue; }
00120   const size_t& Iteration() { return iteration; }
00121   const size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00122 
00123  private:
00124   double tolerance;
00125   size_t maxIterations;
00126 
00127   const MatType* V;
00128 
00129   size_t iteration;
00130   double residueOld;
00131   double residue;
00132   double normOld;
00133 
00134   size_t reverseStepTolerance;
00135   size_t reverseStepCount;
00136   
00137   bool isCopy;
00138   arma::mat W;
00139   arma::mat H;
00140   double c_indexOld;
00141   double c_index;
00142 }; // class SimpleToleranceTermination
00143 
00144 }; // namespace amf
